title: NEKO: A Proposal for Monitoring and Tracking Academic and Psychological Performance for Students and Identifying Dropout Risks
abstract: Proposal focused on monitoring academic and psychological performance to identify dropout risks.

title: Five-Layer Architecture Proposal using AWS Services and Applied for Cloud E-learning Platforms based on Laravel
abstract: Architecture proposal for cloud e-learning platforms using AWS services and Laravel.

title: Quality Evaluation Model of the ISO/IEC 25010 Standard in Web Applications based on Laravel to Optimize the Performance of an E-learning Platform
abstract: Quality evaluation model based on ISO/IEC 25010 for Laravel web apps to improve e-learning platform performance.
